alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SCATTERED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WITH TORRENTIAL DOWNPOURS ACROSS THE NORTHWOODS... Small clusters of showers and isolated thunderstorms will continue across north-central Wisconsin through 8 pm. The showers and storms will be mainly north and west of a line from Merrill to Antigo to Iron Mountain, Michigan. At 640 pm, the greatest concentration of showers and thunderstorms were near Three Lakes east to three miles west of Newald. Torrential rain and gusts to around 30 mph are possible with the stronger storms. When combined with a slow drift of the storms to the south around 5 mph, some locations could see 1 to 2 inches of rain in a short period of time. That may result in some ponding of water on area roadways. Street flooding will be possible in the Three Lakes area. Boaters should remain off inland lakes while thunderstorms are in the area. Anyone driving across the area should be prepared to encounter very heavy rainfall and limited visibility. Do not attempt to drive your vehicle through standing water on flooded roadways.
